articles.title: Oppo gains ground in SA’s smartphone market - ITWeb
articles.description: Since launching in October last year, the company now boasts of a 10% market share in South Africa’s tightly-contested smartphone market.
articles.content:
Just over a year after launching in the South African market, Chinese smartphone brand Oppo is gaining market share.
